_header: It is the property of a gentleman
Note:
Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 837.
_description: Proverbial statement about gentlemen’s speech — one couplet

BodRawC86.Transcription:
It is þe properte of A gentilmanTo say the beste þat he
                    can

Furnivall,  Frederick James,
                        ed.  
             The Babees Book, etc.
